snippet: It was a night of great relief for collectors and dealers after last week’s disappointing auctions of Impressionist and modern art.
abstract: Mark Rothko's classic painting 'No 1 (Royal, Red and Blue)' sells for $75.1 million at Sotheby's contemporary art auction; Jackson Pollock piece sells for $40.4 million, a record for the artist at auction.
lead_paragraph: It was a night of great relief for collectors and dealers after last week’s disappointing auctions of Impressionist and modern art.

headline.seo: $375.1 Million Contemporary Art Sale Is Sotheby’s Record
headline.main: $375.1 Million Art Sale Is Sotheby’s Record
headline.print_headline: $375.1 Million Art Sale Is Sotheby’s Record
